name: Landhaus Roscher
description: In a quiet, sunny position at the edge of the forest, and still only a 3 minute walk away from: The Penken lifts, adventure swimming pool, tennis courts, mini golf and shopping! Relax in summer in our garden with children's play area, and of course, your well behaved pets are also very welcome. You may use the following facilities in the closely situated Fun & Spa Hotel Strass: In summer: indoor pool for free; In winter: indoor pool and free entry to the Sports Arena Disco. You may also book halfboard, with a choice of 3 meals, which will also be served to you in the Fun & Spa Hotel Strass.

Included: Bed linen, hand and bath towels, heating, water, electricity, local taxes. Excluded: Telephone, final cleaning charge.
Discounts made for children! Price for 4 - 5 persons on request.

Arriving on the B169 - straight on at the Mayrhofen roundabout, past the railway station, left at Einfahrt Mitte, right at the next junction going on until Fun & Spa Hotel Strass, left at the butchers (Metzgerei Gasser) and on to the Kegelbahn (bowling alley). Landhaus Dr. Roscher can be found behind the Kegelbahn.
